amendment.description: To exempt certain sightseeing flights from taxes on air transportation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 657 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 657 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S6451-6456; text: CR S6456) To exempt certain sightseeing flights from taxes on air transportation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 657 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 657 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Inouye.
